description.value:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Stumbling Stance].

You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Flurry of Blows], you can attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Feint] as a free action just before the first Strike.

On a success, instead of making the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] against your next attack, they become flat-footed against both attacks from the Flurry of Blows.
